item.title: Quick LXC configuration with netctl nat
item.author: gonzih@gmail.com (Max Gonzih)
item.description: So I spend few hours playing with Linux Containers. Pretty interesting stuff. So here is small tutorial on how to create and use container on Arch Linux as host machine.
